articles.title: Genome-wide association study and functional characterization identifies candidate genes for insulin-stimulated glucose uptake - Nature.com
articles.description: Genome-wide association analyses of two oral glucose tolerance test-derived measures of postprandial insulin resistance discover ten new loci. Functional characterization identifies nine candidate genes implicated in the regulation of GLUT4.
